snippet: The judge in the case of James E. Holmes, who is charged with killing 12 people in a mass shooting in Colorado, denied requests by defense lawyers for more time.
abstract: Colorado Judge William B Sylvester, frustrated with defense's repeated requests for more time, enters not guilty plea for James E Holmes, student charged with killing 12 people and wounding many more during mass shooting at Aurora movie theater.
lead_paragraph: The judge in the case of James E. Holmes, who is charged with killing 12 people in a mass shooting in Colorado, denied requests by defense lawyers for more time.

headline.seo: Judge Enters Not Guilty Plea for James E. Holmes
headline.main: Not Guilty Plea Is Entered in Colorado Mass Shooting
headline.print_headline: Not Guilty Plea Is Entered In Colorado Mass Shooting
